requirements: Prerequisites: PHYS 301, 410, and 440 or permission of instructor.
description:
This course is subdivided into two topics. We study thermodynamics from a purely macroscopic point of view and then we devote time to the study of statistical mechanics, the microscopic foundation of thermodynamics.
Prerequisites: PHYS 301, 410, and 440 or permission of instructor.
